method: In a mixing bowl, combine flour, sugar, and cornstarch.
Add butter and vanilla extract, and mix until the dough comes together.
Shape the dough into small balls and place them on a baking sheet.
Take a pinch of magic and sprinkle it over each cookie dough ball.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes or until the edges are slightly golden.
Let the cookies cool on a wire rack before enjoying their whispery goodness.
